module.name: ap210_interconnect_physical_requirements
module.name.french: Exigence physiques d'interconnexion physique pour l'AP 210
module.keywords: module,detailed physical requirement, interconnect design, requirement allocation, electrical, connector placement, embedded component, configuration management, change management

abstract.p: the representation of interconnect physical requirements. This Data includes all information related to shape and position requirements. Trace, via and other passage spacing, keepin, keepout, etc. is included. Explicit allowed volumetric shape, required connection locations, material specifications, etc. are included. Those layout items whose placement is driven by thermal considerations or electromagnetic interference may be specified. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided. This data includes at least one geometric representation.
abstract.li: shape based requirements allocated to interconnect design;
location requirements allocated to component in an interconnect design;
grouping requirements allocated to component in an interconnect design;
keepin requirements allocated to component categories in an interconnect design;
keepout requirements allocated to component categories in an interconnect design;
location requirements allocated to feature in an interconnect design;
grouping requirements allocated to feature in an interconnect design;
keepin requirements allocated to feature categories in an interconnect design;
keepout requirements allocated to feature categories in an interconnect design;

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of interconnect physical requirements. This Data includes all information related to shape and position requirements. Trace, via and other passage spacing, keepin, keepout, etc. is included. Explicit allowed volumetric shape, required connection locations, material specifications, etc. are included. Those layout items whose placement is driven by thermal considerations or electromagnetic interference may be specified. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided. This data includes at least one geometric representation.

inscope.li: shape based requirements allocated to interconnect design;
location requirements allocated to component in an interconnect design;
grouping requirements allocated to component in an interconnect design;
keepin requirements allocated to component categories in an interconnect design;
keepout requirements allocated to component categories in an interconnect design;
location requirements allocated to feature in an interconnect design;
grouping requirements allocated to feature in an interconnect design;
keepin requirements allocated to feature categories in an interconnect design;
keepout requirements allocated to feature categories in an interconnect design;
items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1628;
items within the scope of application module Fabrication requirement, ISO/TS 10303-1669;
items within the scope of application module Interconnect placement requirements, ISO/TS 10303-1690;
items within the scope of application module Test requirement allocation, ISO/TS 10303-1751.
